TEXT.English: %D1: "A first impression is a lasting one."
TEXT.French: %D1: "A first impression is a lasting one."
TEXT.Italian: %D1: "La prima impressione è quella che conta."
TEXT.Spanish: %D1: "La primera impresion es la que cuenta."
TEXT.Finnish: %D1: "A first impression is a lasting one."

TEXT.German: %D1: "Wir fühlen uns von Ihren Allianzen bedroht."

TEXT.English: %D1: "Your small civilization is no threat to us."
TEXT.French: %D1: "Your small civilization is no threat to us."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Ihre kleine Zivilisation ist keine Bedrohung für uns."
TEXT.Italian: %D1: "La vostra piccola civiltà non è una minaccia per noi."
TEXT.Spanish: %D1: "Su ínfima Civilización no supone ninguna amenaza para nosotros."
TEXT.Finnish: %D1: "Your small civilization is no threat to us."

TEXT.English: %D1: "We feel threatened by your large civilization."
TEXT.French: %D1: "We feel threatened by your large civilization."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Wir fühlen uns durch Ihre große Zivilisation bedroht."
TEXT.Italian: %D1: "Ci sentiamo minacciati dalla vostra grande civiltà."
TEXT.Spanish: %D1: "Nos sentimos amenazados por su enorme civilización."
TEXT.Finnish: %D1: "We feel threatened by your large civilization."

TEXT.Italian: %D1: "Le nazioni più piccole dovrebbero lavorare insieme."

TEXT.English: %D1: "The war is not going well for us."
TEXT.French: %D1: "The war is not going well for us."
TEXT.German: %D1: "The Krieg läuft nicht gut für uns."

TEXT.Finnish: %D1: "The war is not going well for us."
